<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemist's Fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3287)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=548" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=699" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 283 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 244 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals the listed fire damage, [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

</column>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

---

The bomb deals 1d8 fire damage, 1 persistent fire damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

**Bulk** L
